levels.description: <@ba.vdown>Stops attacking</>; DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>, upon receiving an enemy attack, deals Arts damage to the attacker equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Nian's ATK and silences them for <@ba.vup>{silence}</> seconds
